data.actual_result: Just nothing happens ( You can't talk in the voice chat)
data.expected_result: Your microphone gets activated (your profile pic in the voice chat gets green surrounded)
data.short_description: Push to talk key doesn't work
data.steps_to_repro: - Select Push to Talk as Input mode in the Voice & Video Settings - Set any key for Push to Talk - join a voice channel - press the Push to Talk key
